flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: It flies straight at its target’s face,nthen clamps down on the startlednvictim to inject poison.
It flies straightnat its target'snface then clampsfdown on the star­ntled victim toninject poison.
It usually clingsnto cliffs. When itnspots its prey, itfspreads its wingsnand glides down tonattack.
It builds its nestnon a steep cliff.nWhen it is donefgliding, it hopsnalong the groundnback to its nest.

GLIGAR glides through the air withoutna sound as if it were sliding.nThis POKéMON hangs on to the face offits foe using its clawed hind legs andnthe large pincers on its forelegs, thenninjects the prey with its poison barb.

GLIGAR glides through the air withoutna sound as if it were sliding.nThis POKéMON hangs on to the face offits foe using its clawed hind legs andnthe large pincers on its forelegs, thenninjects the prey with its poison barb.
It glides without making a single sound.nIt grasps the face of its foe using itsnhind and large front claws, then stabsnwith its poison barb.
It usually clings to cliffs. When it spotsnits prey, it spreads its wings and glidesndown to attack.
It sails on the winds with itsnlimbs extended to strike from thensky. It aims for the prey’s face.
It sails on the winds with itsnlimbs extended to strike from thensky. It aims for the prey’s face.
It glides as if sliding. It startlesnfoes by clamping on to their faces,nthen jabs with its poison stinger.
It flies straight at its target’snface, then clamps down on thenstartled victim to inject poison.
It usually clings to cliffs. When itnspots its prey, it spreads its wingsnand glides down to attack.
Il fend l’air et fond sur sa proienpour s’agripper à son visage etnla frapper avec son dard.
It glides as if sliding. It startlesnfoes by clamping on to their faces,nthen jabs with its poison stinger.
Il fend l’air et fond sur sa proienpour s’agripper à son visage etnla frapper avec son dard.
It glides as if sliding. It startlesnfoes by clamping on to their faces,nthen jabs with its poison stinger.
It clamps on to its chosen prey thennjabs the stinger on its tail into thenprey while it’s stunned with surprise.
It clamps on to its chosen prey thennjabs the stinger on its tail into thenprey while it’s stunned with surprise.
いつもは　がけに　はりついている。nえものをみつけると　はねをひろげnかぜにのり　おそいかかってくる。
보통은 벼랑에 붙어 있다.n먹이를 발견하면 날개를 펼쳐n바람을 타고 날아 덮친다.
Il s’accroche souvent aux falaises. Sa proie repérée,nil plane vers elle pour l’attaquer.
Es hängt meist an Klippen. Erspäht es Beute,nspreizt es seine Flügel und greift diese sofort an.
A veces se sujeta a los precipicios. Cuando divisa unanpresa, despliega sus alas y planea para atacar.
Di solito sta attaccato agli scogli. Attacca la predanspalancando le ali e planando.
It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey,nit spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
いつもは　崖に　張りついている。n獲物を見つけると　羽を広げn風に乗り　襲いかかってくる。
がんめん　めがけて　とんでくる。nはりつかれた　えものが　おどろくnあいだに　どくばりを　さしこむ。
얼굴을 겨냥하고 날아와n들러붙어 먹이가 놀라는n사이에 독침을 찌른다.
Il vole droit vers le visage de sa cible effrayée et s’ynaccroche pour lui injecter son poison.
Es fliegt direkt auf das Gesicht seiner Feinde zunund injiziert ihnen eine Überdosis Gift.
Vuela directo a la cara del objetivo y acaba con sunaterrada víctima inyectándole veneno.
Vola in picchiata sulla testa del nemico, lo atterra engli inietta il suo veleno.
It flies straight at its target’s face, then clampsndown on the startled victim to inject poison.
顔面　めがけて　飛んでくる。n張りつかれた　獲物が　驚くnあいだに　毒針を　刺しこむ。
おとを　たてず　すべる　ように　かっくうする。nりょううでの　おおきな　ツメと　あしの　ツメでnえものの　かおに　しがみつき　どくばりを　さす。
소리 내지 않고 미끄러지듯 활공한다.n양손의 커다란 손톱과 발의 발톱으로n먹이의 얼굴에 달라붙어 독침을 찌른다.

Scorplane plane dans les airs sans un bruit, comme s’il glissait.nCe Pokémon s’accroche au visage de son ennemi grâce auxnserres de ses pattes arrière et aux pinces de ses pattes avant,net pique avec son dard empoisonné.

Skorgla segelt lautlos durch die Lüfte. Es verankert sichnmithilfe der Krallen an seinen Hinterbeinen und der riesigennScheren an seinen Vorderbeinen am Gesicht eines Feindesnund vergiftet ihn mit seinem Giftstachel.

Gligar planea por el aire sin hacer ningún ruido, como si fueranpatinando. Este Pokémon se agarra a la cara de su rival connlas patas traseras, con forma de garra, y las pinzas de lasndelanteras y le inyecta veneno por el aguijón.

Gligar fende l’aria impercettibilmente come se stessenscivolando. Questo Pokémon si aggrappa al viso del nemiconusando le zampe posteriori artigliate e le possenti chelensulle zampe anteriori, poi avvelena la preda con il suo aculeo.

Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it werensliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe usingnits clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, thenninjects the prey with its poison barb.
音を　立てず　滑る　ように　滑空する。n両腕の　大きな　ツメと　足の　ツメでn獲物の　顔に　しがみつき　毒針を　刺す。
